subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After New England secured a fifth straight A.F.C. title game berth Saturday, Bill Belichick praised his players for staying committed. “It’s what we’re here for, is to win,” he said.
snippet: After New England secured a fifth straight A.F.C. title game berth Saturday, Bill Belichick praised his players for staying committed. “It’s what we’re here for, is to win,” he said.
